segments.text: Excuse me , How do I get to the Grand hotel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry , I didn ’ t catch what you said . Could you repeat it please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The Grand hotel , is it far from here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , my English isn ’ t so good . Could you speak a little slower ?
segments.speaker: S2
